Instruction: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees Fahrenheit.

Mix together sugar, egg, salt, and shortening in a bowl. Then add flour, baking soda, and spices to the mixture and combine well. Form teaspoon-sized portions of dough into balls and coat them with sugar.
Bake for about 5 to 6 minutes at 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
